scripts.tsoa-gen: npm run routes-gen && npm run swagger-gen
scripts.start-gen: npm run clean && npm run tsoa-gen && tsc && npm run swagger-copy && nodemon ./build/index.js
scripts.swagger-client: npm run clean-swagger && swagger-codegen generate -i http://localhost:8080/api/docs/swagger.json -o ./angular-src/src/app/swagger-api -l typescript-angular -c ./swagger-config.json
scripts.heroku-prebuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false; export NODE_ENV=; NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=false NODE_ENV=development npm install --only=dev --dev
scripts.heroku-postbuild: export NPM_CONFIG_PRODUCTION=true; export NODE_ENV=production; cd ./angular-src/ && npm install
scripts.start-prod: npm run clean && cd ./angular-src/ && ng build --prod && cd .. && npm run start-gen
